channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Intercampus for Correio da Manhã, 4–9 April 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 6–8 seats
  • Iniciativa Liberal (RE): 1–2 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • Chega (PfE): 3–5 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 0–1 seats
  • Aliança Democrática (EPP): 5–8 seats
  • LIVRE (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
